examples.text: Do you live with your mum or your dad?
Is it OK if I borrow the car, Dad?
She went on holiday with her mum and dad.
My old dad got really wild if you said he was working-class.

definitions.definition: financial support from your parents, especially when you are an adult

examples.text: Without support from the Bank of Mum and Dad, they could find themselves locked out of the housing market.

wordOrigin: mid 16th cent.: perhaps imitative of a young child's first syllables da, da.
